query-mapping.description: The list of posts for the blog administrator.

query.name: storage-folder-list
query.comment: Get a list of storage folders that a user can see.
query.sql: SELECT folder.id, folder.name, folder.create_date FROM awa_storage_folder as folder INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = folder.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = $entity_type[awa_workspace] AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[folder-create]
